definition: to guard/to defend/to keep watch/to abide by the law/to observe (rules or ritual)/nearby/adjoining
letter/mail/CL:封[feng1]/to trust/to believe/to profess faith in/truthful/confidence/trust/at will/at random
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore

sentences.english: I believe whatever he says, for he always keeps his word.
sentences.chinese: 無論他說什麼我都相信，因爲他一直都守信用。

sentences.english: How could you break your promise?
He accused them of bad faith.
I’m sure they’d prefer someone who keeps his word.
sentences.chinese: 我想他們寧願要一個守信用的人。

sentences.english: To change another words, a man who often breaks his promise will be repelled everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 換句話說，不守信用的人處處都會受到排擠。

sentences.english: I think responsibility, staidness , honest, keep wokds is principle as a person.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲有責任心，認真，誠實，守信用是做人的原則。

sentences.english: He will surely finish the work in time as he is a man of his word.
sentences.chinese: 他一定會按時做完工作，因爲他是一個守信用的人。

sentences.english: It's our principle in business to honor the contract and keep our promise.
sentences.chinese: “重合同，守信用”是我們經營的原則。

sentences.english: Thou wilt be faithful, little Charles?
sentences.chinese: 你會守信用麼，小查爾斯？

sentences.english: Appraised as a company "strictly abide by contracts and with punctuality " by Zhejiang Province People's Government.
sentences.chinese: 被省人民政府評爲“浙江省重合同守信用先進單位”。

sentences.english: Prof. Luo is a man of his word.
sentences.chinese: 羅教授時一個守信用的人。

sentences.english: Yes, but a demon of my word, I should hope.
sentences.chinese: 對，但卻是個守信用的惡魔，希望如此。

sentences.english: This was the second time he let us down. We won't trust him again.
sentences.chinese: 這是他第二次不守信用，我們不能再信賴他了。

sentences.english: Xinxiang Municipal Government awarded Henan Jinhe" the contract and trustworthy enterprise "and so on.
sentences.chinese: 新鄉市人民政府授予“重合同守信用企業”等。

sentences.english: He has promised to do it, only he does not keep his word.
sentences.chinese: 他已答應做那件事了，只是他不守信用。
